alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Pender, Bladen, southeastern Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from 6 miles east of Ammon to Fairmont. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Elizabethtown, Rowan, Fairmont, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Boardman, Penderlea, Hallsboro, Bladen Community College, Butters, Redbug, Council, Southeastern Community College, Wards Corner, Carvers, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Murray Town and Lagoon. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 390 and 396. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
